original_text: Is anything too hard for the Lord? At the appointed time I will return to you, about this time next year, and Sarah shall have a son.”
korean_text: 여호와께 능하지 못한 일이 있겠느냐 기한이 이를 때에 내가 네게로 돌아오리니 사라에게 아들이 있으리라

sentences.original_text: Is anything too hard for the Lord?
At the appointed time I will return to you
sentences.korean_translation: 정한 때에 내가 네게로 다시 오리니

sentences.original_text: and Sarah shall have a son
